title: How to write a letter to Ellen about myself - Quora

response.answer_text: Hello! Ellen , it’s my pleasure writing to you this letter . I am 37 years old and moved to the USA in 2016 . I have a beautiful daughter. I just want to tell you that your are God’s gift sent from heaven continue to do the marvelous work . I know the world would be way better with more persons like you . I watched your shows and you are my motivator . I hope one day I can do what you are doing and make ppl happy . Am addicted to your shows . Continue to do what you love and your basket will always be filled in Jesus name . I pray for longlife and good health so you always be doing such amazing work until God says when . I know I will meet you one day if it’s God’s will . #youareblessed 🙏🏽❤️🤗
